content.body:
I've found a case where `` renders differently in different browsers, and once again I'm wondering why `
` and `` are still specified in terms of `display-outside`, which is not part of CSS currently, and which I doubt was ever in a published CSS standard
content.formatted_body: I've found a case where <wbr> renders differently in different browsers, and once again I'm wondering why <br> and <wbr> are still specified in terms of display-outside, which is not part of CSS currently, and which I doubt was ever in a published CSS standard
